modules.name: Content Intelligence
modules.description: Analyze content quality, structure, and AI-readiness

keyInsights.title: Strong semantic structure
keyInsights.description: Your content demonstrates clear topic hierarchy and semantic relationships

keyInsights.title: Adequate depth coverage
keyInsights.description: Most topic areas covered with reasonable depth, but some opportunities exist

keyInsights.title: Moderate use of structured data
keyInsights.description: Schema markup present but could be expanded to more content types

issues.title: Missing topic clusters
issues.description: 5 key topics lack comprehensive supporting content

issues.title: Inconsistent terminology
issues.description: Some variations in how key concepts are described across pages

recommendations.title: Expand topic clusters
recommendations.description: Create 3-5 comprehensive guides for underrepresented topics

recommendations.title: Standardize terminology
recommendations.description: Create internal glossary and apply consistently

recommendations.title: Add FAQ sections
recommendations.description: Structure common questions into FAQ formats for better retrieval

modules.name: Visibility Analysis
modules.description: Track presence and mentions across AI search platforms

keyInsights.title: ChatGPT visibility moderate
keyInsights.description: Domain appears in approximately 35% of ChatGPT responses for industry keywords

keyInsights.title: Gemini presence weak
keyInsights.description: Lower representation compared to competitors in Google Gemini

keyInsights.title: Perplexity citations improving
keyInsights.description: Slight improvement in citation frequency over past month

issues.title: Low Gemini visibility
issues.description: Only cited in 18% of Gemini responses vs 45% for top competitor

issues.title: Limited breadth
issues.description: Only visible for primary keywords, not long-tail variations

recommendations.title: Increase content diversity
recommendations.description: Create content targeting long-tail and question-based keywords

recommendations.title: Improve indexing signals
recommendations.description: Enhance technical SEO and link profile for better AI platform indexing

modules.name: EEAT Scoring
modules.description: Evaluate Expertise, Experience, Authority, and Trust

keyInsights.title: Strong authority signals
keyInsights.description: Good domain age, established backlink profile, and consistent publishing

keyInsights.title: Credible authors
keyInsights.description: Author bios and credentials clearly established on key content

keyInsights.title: Trust indicators present
keyInsights.description: Customer testimonials, certifications, and third-party validation visible

issues.title: Limited author expertise signals
issues.description: Some author pages lack detailed expertise credentials

recommendations.title: Enhance author credentials
recommendations.description: Add detailed expertise profiles and achievements to author pages

modules.name: Keyword Coverage
modules.description: Non-branded keyword positioning and gap analysis

keyInsights.title: Solid core coverage
keyInsights.description: 78% of primary industry keywords covered with relevant content

keyInsights.title: Long-tail underrepresented
keyInsights.description: Only 42% coverage of long-tail and question-based keywords

keyInsights.title: Emerging topic gaps
keyInsights.description: New market trends not yet addressed in content

issues.title: Missing long-tail content
issues.description: 1,240+ relevant long-tail keywords without dedicated content

issues.title: Competitive gaps
issues.description: 12 keywords with high AI visibility potential not covered

recommendations.title: Develop long-tail content strategy
recommendations.description: Create targeted content for top 200 long-tail keywords

recommendations.title: Address competitive gaps
recommendations.description: Create comprehensive guides for high-potential keywords

keyInsights.title: You rank 3rd in market
keyInsights.description: In visibility metrics across AI platforms in your segment

keyInsights.title: Leader has 2.3x visibility
keyInsights.description: Top competitor appears in significantly more AI responses

keyInsights.title: Content depth varies
keyInsights.description: Competitors averaging 35% more comprehensive content

issues.title: Content volume disadvantage
issues.description: Publishing 40% less content than leading competitor

issues.title: Lower citation frequency
issues.description: Cited less frequently in AI-generated responses

recommendations.title: Increase publishing velocity
recommendations.description: Scale content production to match competitor output

recommendations.title: Improve content quality
recommendations.description: Focus on depth and comprehensiveness vs competitors

modules.name: Brand Safety
modules.description: Monitor mentions, sentiment, and brand protection

keyInsights.title: Positive sentiment dominant
keyInsights.description: 92% of AI-generated mentions are neutral to positive

keyInsights.title: Misinformation minimal
keyInsights.description: No significant false claims detected in AI responses

keyInsights.title: Brand association strong
keyInsights.description: Clear association with core business values in AI context

recommendations.title: Maintain content quality
recommendations.description: Continue current content standards to preserve brand safety

modules.name: Recommendations Engine
modules.description: Prioritized action items and implementation roadmap

keyInsights.title: Quick wins identified
keyInsights.description: 8 high-impact, low-effort improvements available

keyInsights.title: Strategic opportunities
keyInsights.description: 3 major initiatives could increase visibility 40%+

keyInsights.title: Implementation roadmap ready
keyInsights.description: Prioritized 90-day and 6-month action plans available

issues.title: Resource constraints noted
issues.description: Major initiatives require content team scaling

recommendations.title: Execute quick wins first

recommendations.title: Plan strategic initiatives
recommendations.description: Build 6-month roadmap for major content and technical initiatives
